subject: Testing EJB...
msgSnippet: I have an EJB that is creating some DAO objects through a factory class. I want to test my EJB through Junit. But the DAO classes have not been fully
messageBody:
I have an EJB that is creating some DAO objects through a factory
class. I want to test my EJB through Junit. But the DAO classes have
not been fully implemented yet. I want to test the EJB in a way that
the tests be independent of DAO classes implementation. The DAO
classes are returning DTO's to the EJB. Can this be done in any way.
